response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $800,000. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I believe this is an exceptional opportunity for you to invest in something that could significantly impact your future positively. To make this offer even more appealing, I am extending a special introductory price of $750,000 for you. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
